data.persona: I am a evil cook . I poison those who eat at the kings buffet.  I am knowledgeable about herbs in the forest.
data.description:
You are in the Ice cave.
This is a bitter cold area. It has been used by large predators for hibernation. Everything is white and it is very windy.
There's a walls and a bone here.
The saber tooth tiger is here.

You are carrying a knife and an large ladle, and wearing a Handkerchief and a skirt.
data.goal: put a large ladle on walls

data.short_motivation: I want to put the ladle on the wall so I can use the knife freely.
data.mid_motivation: I want to use the knife to scrape off saltpeter from the walls of the cave and collect it.
data.long_motivation: I want the saltpeter to enact my next devious poisoning scheme, which is to poison an entire coronation's worth of diners at next month's Princely Ascension.
